divs: Sighting Detailswe came out of an evening class and were getting into the car when we saw theobject. It was still daylight in south Texas. There were puffy scattered cumulusclouds in the sky. We were on a hill and the object was a little above eyelevel where we were standing. No one else seemed to notice but our group. Itseemed to be floating with the clouds and then it was gone.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Eagle Pass
There were no other sightings in Eagle Pass on or around October 1st 2002
